text: We may also use your information to contact you about our goods and services that may be of interest to you.
This Privacy Policy ("Policy") describes how Helmeton inc., ("Helmeton" "we," "us," or "our"), transmits, uses, shares, and protects the business, financial, and Personal Information.

We may also process your 'Sensitive Information' held in the documents uploaded to our platforms or apps by or on behalf of you.
We may collect, use, or disclose Sensitive Information with your consent when providing our Services to you.
